Statement.sql: WITH AUTH_MENU AS (SELECT MENU.MENU_ID ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_INQ) AS AUTH_INQ ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_REG) AS AUTH_REG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_PRT) AS AUTH_PRT ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_CHG) AS AUTH_CHG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_DEL) AS AUTH_DEL FROM TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_DTL GRPD ,TSYMU_MENU MENU ,TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_USER GRPU WHERE GRPU.USER_ID = 'ADMIN' AND GRPD.AUTH_GRP_ID = GRPU.AUTH_GRP_ID AND MENU.LVL = 4 AND MENU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU.MENU_ID = GRPD.MENU_ID GROUP BY MENU.MENU_ID) SELECT LEVEL, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NM, A.UPP_MENU_ID, FSYCD_CODE_REF2('SY00007', A.URL_CD) AS VIEW_PATH, B.AUTH_INQ, B.AUTH_REG, B.AUTH_PRT, B.AUTH_CHG, B.AUTH_DEL, A.URL_CD, A.LVL, A.SORT_NO, A.USE_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LLEVEL_YN, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_ID,'|') ID_PATH, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_NM,'|') NM_PATH FROM TSYMU_MENU A, AUTH_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) START WITH A.UPP_MENU_ID = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SORT_NO

WITH AUTH_MENU AS (SELECT MENU.MENU_ID ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_INQ) AS AUTH_INQ ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_REG) AS AUTH_REG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_PRT) AS AUTH_PRT ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_CHG) AS AUTH_CHG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_DEL) AS AUTH_DEL FROM TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_DTL GRPD ,TSYMU_MENU MENU ,TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_USER GRPU WHERE GRPU.USER_ID = 'ADMIN' AND GRPD.AUTH_GRP_ID = GRPU.AUTH_GRP_ID AND MENU.LVL = 4 AND MENU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU.MENU_ID = GRPD.MENU_ID GROUP BY MENU.MENU_ID) SELECT LEVEL, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NM, A.UPP_MENU_ID, FSYCD_CODE_REF2('SY00007', A.URL_CD) AS VIEW_PATH, B.AUTH_INQ, B.AUTH_REG, B.AUTH_PRT, B.AUTH_CHG, B.AUTH_DEL, A.URL_CD, A.LVL, A.SORT_NO, A.USE_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LLEVEL_YN, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_ID,'|') ID_PATH, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_NM,'|') NM_PATH FROM TSYMU_MENU A, AUTH_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) START WITH A.UPP_MENU_ID = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SORT_NO

WITH AUTH_MENU AS (SELECT MENU.MENU_ID ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_INQ) AS AUTH_INQ ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_REG) AS AUTH_REG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_PRT) AS AUTH_PRT ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_CHG) AS AUTH_CHG ,MAX(GRPD.AUTH_DEL) AS AUTH_DEL FROM TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_DTL GRPD ,TSYMU_MENU MENU ,TSYAU_AUTH_GRP_USER GRPU WHERE GRPU.USER_ID = 'ADMIN' AND GRPD.AUTH_GRP_ID = GRPU.AUTH_GRP_ID AND MENU.LVL = 4 AND MENU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU.MENU_ID = GRPD.MENU_ID GROUP BY MENU.MENU_ID) SELECT LEVEL, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NM, A.UPP_MENU_ID, FSYCD_CODE_REF2('SY00007', A.URL_CD) AS VIEW_PATH, B.AUTH_INQ, B.AUTH_REG, B.AUTH_PRT, B.AUTH_CHG, B.AUTH_DEL, A.URL_CD, A.LVL, A.SORT_NO, A.USE_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LLEVEL_YN, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_ID,'|') ID_PATH, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_NM,'|') NM_PATH FROM TSYMU_MENU A, AUTH_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) START WITH A.UPP_MENU_ID = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SORT_NO
